mapper.select: select b.book_idx, book_author, book_pub, book_name, book_year, book_ISBN, book_image, r.return_YN, g.book_genre, b.book_genre_idx from book as b left join rent as r ON b.book_idx = r.book_idx left join genre as g ON g.book_genre_idx = b.book_genre_idx where return_YN = 'Y' or return_YN is null

SELECT b.book_idx, b.book_author, b.book_pub, b.book_name, b.book_year, b.book_ISBN, b.book_image, r.return_YN, g.book_genre FROM book AS b LEFT JOIN rent AS r ON b.book_idx = r.book_idx LEFT JOIN genre AS g ON g.book_genre_idx = b.book_genre_idx WHERE (r.return_YN = 'Y' OR r.return_YN IS NULL) AND ( b.book_idx LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b.book_author LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b.book_pub LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b.book_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b.book_year LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b.book_ISBN LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rent (book_idx, member_idx, rent_date, rent_return, return_YN) VALUES (#{book_idx}, (SELECT member_idx FROM member WHERE member_id = #{member_id} limit 1), NOW(), DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY),'N')
mapper.select: select b.book_idx, b.book_author, b.book_pub, b.book_name, b.book_image, r.member_idx, r.rent_date, r.rent_return from book as b left join rent as r ON b.book_idx = r.book_idx where r.member_idx = #{member_idx}
